channel.title: [742] DragonScape 24/7 No lag
channel.description:
DragonScape is a new 742 Rsps 24/7, no lag and many features including:
lots of bosses: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/aw6jww.jpg[/img]
Loyalty shop(with working auras): [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5lneio.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5544n6.png[/img]
Squeal of fortune: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/9b95oi.png[/img]
All skills including construction and dungeoneering
All Current Books prayer magic and emote: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/161hm3s.jpg[/img]
New Version 742 items, maps, and models!
Custom content Custom items Custom spellbook(planned)
our programmer knows what hes doing up to 0-10 updates daily (all done in one big update to reduce downtime) also the programmer takes requests occasionally we love our player input
This is a very small community and we are always welcoming players and new staff if you want staff ask Fuzzy about it in game "staff" does not necessarily mean mod or admin it means i will make use of your personal skills whatever they may be...
for the first few weeks of launching the server i am releasing my Skype to help coordinate play times to all the players who join: project.demon
Virus scan and download: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ljnxuq.png[/img]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20V5.jar"]Click to play![/URL]
note: may be slow or laggy upon first start up you will have to play with graphics settings for me all i did is clicked resizable

item.title: [742] DragonScape 24/7 No lag

item.description:

Roar337:

my bosses have pretty good drop rates also please do try if you really can i need to get to work fixing them so help me out and test XD

just delete the illusive and the other 2 from korasi quest add frost dragons and other bosses and your good
thats what im doing basicly just redoing my boss’s for more items and stuff
